title: DTL to Traditional German Date String
name: LGF_DTLToString_DE
description: This function converts a date of data type DTL into a character string of data type STRING in the traditional format (DD MM YYYY).

input.name: date
input.description: Date to convert as DTL tag

input.name: separator
input.description: Separator between the components of the output date.

return_value.description: Output string according to the traditional format.
